verses.roman:
śuniyā karila prabhu bahuta satkāra
tomā sama pṛthivīte kavi nāhi āra

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing this; karila—did; prabhu—the Lord; bahuta—very much; satkāra—high praise; tomā—you; sama—like; pṛthivīte—in the world; kavi—poet; nāhi—there is not; āra—anyone else.
translation: The Lord praised him, saying, "Sir, there is no greater poet than you in the entire world.
